item.title: OpenAI 推出 ChatGPT「购物研究」功能
item.guid: OpenAI-推出-ChatGPT「购物研究」功能
item.description:
OpenAI officially launched the "Shopping Research" feature early this morning, providing ChatGPT users with a brand new product search and decision-making experience. OpenAI 今天凌晨正式推出「购物研究」（Shopping Research）功能，为 ChatGPT 用户提供全新的产品搜索与决策体验。

This feature is based on a dedicated version of GPT‑5 mini, optimized with reinforcement learning, aiming to help users quickly generate personalized buying guides in complex shopping scenarios. Users only need to describe their needs, and the system can automatically retrieve high-quality information from the internet and generate detailed product comparisons and recommendations within minutes. 该功能基于 GPT‑5 mini 的专用版本，结合强化学习进行优化，旨在帮助用户在复杂的购物场景中快速生成个性化的购买指南。用户只需描述需求，系统即可自动检索互联网高质量信息，并在几分钟内生成详细的产品对比与推荐。

OpenAI stated that Shopping Research can not only handle details such as price, specifications, and inventory, but also dynamically adjust based on real-time user feedback. For example, users can mark "not interested" or "more like this" to optimize results. If ChatGPT's memory function is enabled, the system will also combine users' past preferences for more accurate recommendations. OpenAI 表示，购物研究不仅能处理价格、规格、库存等细节，还能根据用户的实时反馈进行动态调整。例如，用户可标记「不感兴趣」或「更多类似」来优化结果。若开启 ChatGPT 的记忆功能，系统还会结合用户过往偏好进行更精准的推荐。

Currently, the feature has been launched on mobile and web platforms, covering Free, Go, Plus, and Pro user plans. To coincide with the holiday shopping season, OpenAI announced that it will provide almost unlimited usage for all users during the festive period. In the future, Shopping Research will also support "Instant Checkout," allowing users to complete purchases directly within ChatGPT. 目前，该功能已在移动端与网页端上线，覆盖 Free、Go、Plus 与 Pro 用户计划。为配合假日购物季，OpenAI 宣布在节日期间为所有用户提供几乎无限的使用次数。未来，购物研究还将支持「即时结账」（Instant Checkout），允许用户直接在 ChatGPT 内完成购买。

OpenAI emphasized that this feature will not share user conversations with retailers. All results are sourced from public retail websites and cite reliable sources to ensure transparency and credibility. Additionally, details such as prices or inventory provided by this feature may contain errors, and users should refer to the merchant's page for accuracy. OpenAI 强调，该功能不会与零售商共享用户对话，所有结果均来自公开零售网站，且引用可靠来源以确保透明度与可信度。此外，该功能提供的价格或库存等细节可能出现误差，用户需以商家页面为准。

item.title: 高通确认与苹果互传文件功能将登陆更多 Android 机型
item.guid: 高通确认与苹果互传文件功能将登陆更多-Android-机型
item.description:
According to NotebookCheck, Qualcomm has confirmed that Google's "Quick Share" feature, which supports interoperability with Apple's AirDrop, will be extended to devices powered by Snapdragon chips in the future. 据 NotebookCheck 报道，高通确认，支持与苹果隔空投送 AirDrop 互通的 Google「快速分享」（Quick Share）功能将在未来扩展至搭载骁龙芯片的设备。

Qualcomm stated on X that it "can't wait for users to experience this feature on Snapdragon devices," but has not yet announced a specific launch date. 高通在 X 上表示「迫不及待地希望用户能在骁龙设备上体验这一功能」，但尚未公布具体上线时间。

Previously, Google revealed that this feature will not be limited to its own Tensor chip devices, and may cover brands such as Samsung, OnePlus, and Nothing in the future. 此前，Google 已透露，该功能不会局限于自家 Tensor 芯片设备，未来可能覆盖三星、一加以及 Nothing 等品牌机型。

Reports indicate that in addition to mobile phones, devices such as tablets and Chromebooks are also expected to receive support. 报道指出，除手机外，平板与 Chromebook 等设备也有望获得支持。

However, Bloomberg reporter Mark Gurman believes that Apple may take measures to block this feature as soon as possible, but may be constrained by factors such as the EU's Digital Markets Act. 不过，彭博社记者 Mark Gurman 认为，苹果或将尽快采取措施以封堵这一功能，但可能受制于欧盟《数字市场法案》等因素。

item.title: Claude Opus 4.5 正式推出
item.guid: Claude-Opus-4.5-正式推出
item.description:
Anthropic officially launched its new generation large model, Claude Opus 4.5, early this morning, demonstrating significant improvements in daily tasks such as in-depth research, slide, and table processing. Anthropic 于今天凌晨正式推出新一代大模型 Claude Opus 4.5，在深度研究、幻灯片与表格处理等日常任务中展现出显著提升。

Claude Opus 4.5 achieved the industry's most advanced level in software engineering tests, supporting developers to use the "claude-opus-4-5-20251101" version via API, priced at $5 or $25 per million tokens. Claude Opus 4.5 在软件工程测试中表现达到业界最先进水平，支持开发者通过 API 使用「claude-opus-4-5-20251101」版本，定价为每百万 tokens 5 美元或 25 美元。

Anthropic also updated the Claude Developer Platform, Claude Code, and consumer applications, adding support for long-term task processing in Excel, Chrome, and desktop environments. Anthropic 同时更新了 Claude Developer Platform、Claude Code 以及消费者应用，新增支持 Excel、Chrome 与桌面端的长时任务处理。

Several industry insiders pointed out in tests that Claude Opus 4.5 can demonstrate higher efficiency in complex multi-system error repair, code migration, and refactoring tasks, completing the same work with fewer tokens. Compared to its predecessor Sonnet 4.5, Opus 4.5 achieved a 15% to 20% performance improvement in multiple benchmark tests and maintained stable performance in long-duration autonomous coding tasks. 多位业内人士在测试中指出，Claude Opus 4.5 能够在复杂多系统错误修复、代码迁移与重构等任务中展现更高效率，使用更少 token 完成同样的工作。与前代 Sonnet 4.5 相比，Opus 4.5 在多项基准测试中实现 15% 至 20% 的性能提升，并在长时间自主编码任务中保持稳定表现。

Furthermore, Opus 4.5 has also made progress in security, particularly demonstrating more robust performance in defending against prompt injection attacks. Anthropic stated that the model has shown higher robustness in multiple evaluations, capable of preventing malicious exploitation in critical tasks. 此外，Opus 4.5 在安全性方面也取得进展，尤其在抵御提示注入攻击上表现更为稳健。Anthropic 表示，该模型在多项评估中展现出更高的健壮性，能够在关键任务中避免被恶意利用。

This update also brings new features such as the "effort parameter," allowing developers to flexibly adjust between efficiency and capability. Combined with context compression and advanced tool calling, Opus 4.5 improved by nearly 15 percentage points in deep research evaluations, further solidifying its position among cutting-edge AI models. 此次更新还带来「effort 参数」等新功能，允许开发者在效率与能力之间进行灵活调节。结合上下文压缩与高级工具调用，Opus 4.5 在深度研究评估中提升近 15 个百分点，进一步巩固其在前沿 AI 模型中的地位。

item.title: 豆包输入法官宣上线，主打 AI 语音识别
item.guid: 豆包输入法官宣上线，主打-AI-语音识别
item.description:
Yesterday, Doubao's official WeChat public account posted an announcement, officially launching the Doubao Input Method. Developed by a ByteDance team, it is positioned as an AI input method centered on voice input, aiming to redefine users' text input experience. 昨天，豆包官方微信公众号发文，官宣豆包输入法正式推出。该产品由字节旗下团队研发，定位为一款以语音输入为核心的 AI 输入法，旨在重新定义用户的文字输入体验。

Currently, Doubao Input Method 1.0 has been launched on the Android platform, with the iOS version expected to go live soon, and no specific timetable announced for the PC version. 目前，豆包输入法 1.0 已上线 Android 平台，iOS 端预计近期上线，PC 版则尚未公布具体时间表。

Its biggest highlight is the voice recognition function based on the same voice model as the Doubao App, supporting Chinese, English, and Cantonese, with accuracy significantly leading similar products. Users only need to "press and hold to speak, release to end" to complete input, maintaining a high recognition rate even in complex speaking speeds and mixed language scenarios. 其最大亮点是基于豆包 App 同款语音模型的语音识别功能，支持中文、英文及粤语，准确率表现显著领先于同类产品。用户只需「按住说话，松手结束」，即可完成输入，且在复杂语速和混合语言场景下依旧保持高识别率。

In addition to voice input, Doubao Input Method also offers keyboard input optimization, including smart suggestions, error correction, and Pinyin abbreviation support. In terms of AI integration, when entering "1+1=" or "Who is the author of Journey to the West," the candidate bar can directly display results, reflecting its semantic understanding capabilities. Furthermore, the product supports offline voice model downloads, approximately 150MB in size, allowing continued use in weak network environments. 除了语音输入，豆包输入法还提供键盘输入优化，包括智能联想、纠错和简拼支持。在 AI 融合方面，输入「1+1=」或「西游记的作者是谁」时，候选栏可直接显示结果，体现了语义理解能力。此外，产品支持离线语音模型下载，大小约 150MB，可在弱网环境下继续使用。

item.title: 联想 CFO：正囤积 PC 内存，避免转嫁成本到消费者
item.guid: 联想-CFO：正囤积-PC-内存，避免转嫁成本到消费者
item.description:
According to multiple media reports, Lenovo Group is increasing its memory chip inventory to cope with supply shortages and price increases brought about by the artificial intelligence industry. 据多家媒体报道，联想集团正在加大内存芯片库存，以应对人工智能产业带来的供应紧张与价格上涨。

Lenovo CFO Wong Wai Ming stated in a Bloomberg TV interview that the company's current component inventory is about 50% higher than usual to alleviate supply pressure caused by the surge in demand for AI data centers and cloud hardware. 联想 CFO 郑孝明在彭博电视采访中表示，公司当前零部件库存比平时高出约 50%，以缓解 AI 数据中心和云硬件需求激增导致的供应压力。

He emphasized that Lenovo will do its best to avoid passing on rising costs to consumers and will leverage its high inventory advantage to maintain market competitiveness. 他强调，联想将尽力避免将成本上涨转嫁至消费者端，并利用高库存优势保持市场竞争力。

Additionally, according to Jiemian News, Lenovo Chairman and CEO Yang Yuanqing stated at the earnings conference that the global shortage of DRAM and NAND chips is expected to continue until next year, with prices already up about 50% from before. 此外，据界面新闻报道，联想董事长兼 CEO 杨元庆在财报发布会上称，全球 DRAM 与 NAND 芯片短缺预计将持续至明年，价格已较此前上涨约 50%。

He stated that Lenovo has signed long-term contracts with suppliers such as Samsung and Hynix to ensure stable year-round supply and has locked in most of the production capacity through its scale advantage. 他表示，联想通过与三星、海力士等供应商签订长期合同，确保全年供应稳定，并凭借规模优势锁定大部分产能。

item.title: 腾讯或参投，拓竹融资估值或达 100 亿美金
item.guid: 腾讯或参投，拓竹融资估值或达-100-亿美金
item.description:
According to 36Kr, Topto is close to completing a new round of financing, with Tencent participating, and the company's valuation could reach $10 billion. 据 36 氪报道，拓竹正接近完成新一轮融资，腾讯参投，公司估值或达 100 亿美金。

Sources pointed out that this round of financing continues the trend of Bambu Lab's cooperation with Tencent Cloud in July this year, with Bambu Lab's 3D model platform MakerWorld already integrated with Tencent's Hunyuan 3D generation model. However, both Bambu Lab and Tencent have denied the relevant rumors. 消息人士指出，此轮融资延续了今年 7 月拓竹与腾讯云达成合作的趋势，拓竹旗下 3D 模型平台 MakerWorld 已接入腾讯混元 3D 生成模型。不过，拓竹与腾讯方面均否认相关传闻。

Bambu Lab has performed outstandingly in the consumer 3D printing market in recent years. According to a Soochow Securities research report, the company's revenue last year is estimated to have reached 5.5-6 billion yuan, with a net profit close to 2 billion yuan. Its shipments have exceeded 1.2 million units, and its global market share has reached 29%. The previous round of financing was completed in 2023, with investors including Mingshi Investment, Temasek, True Light, and 5Y Capital. 拓竹近年来在消费级 3D 打印市场表现突出。东吴证券研报显示，去年公司营收预计达到 55-60 亿元，净利润接近 20 亿元。其出货量已超 120 万台，全球市占率达 29%。上一轮融资完成于 2023 年，投资方包括铭石投资、淡马锡、True Light、五源资本。

According to company estimates, over 70% of 3D printing farms globally are equipped with its P1 series printers. Meanwhile, competition is intensifying, with DJI recently announcing an investment in the 3D printing company Smartpie and launching Nexprint China, an open-source 3D model aggregation platform, directly targeting Bambu Lab's MakerWorld community. 据公司估算，全球超过 70% 的 3D 打印农场配备其 P1 系列打印机。与此同时，竞争加剧，大疆近期宣布投资 3D 打印企业智能派，并推出开源 3D 模型聚合平台 Nexprint 中国站，直接对标拓竹社区 MakerWorld。

item.title: 美的与比亚迪携手打造「人车家」智慧生态
item.guid: 美的与比亚迪携手打造「人车家」智慧生态
item.description:
Yesterday, BYD officially announced on Weibo that it had signed a "Human-Vehicle-Home Smart Ecosystem" strategic cooperation agreement with Midea Group at BYD's global headquarters in Shenzhen. Midea Group Chairman and CEO Fang Hongbo and BYD Group Chairman and CEO Wang Chuanfu jointly attended and witnessed the signing ceremony. 昨天，比亚迪在微博官宣，与美的集团在深圳比亚迪全球总部签署「人车家智慧生态」战略合作协议，美的集团董事长兼 CEO 方洪波与比亚迪集团董事长兼 CEO 王传福共同出席并见证签约仪式。

Both parties announced that they will integrate core advantages such as smart cars, smart homes, AIoT technology, and user ecosystems to break the physical boundaries between vehicles and homes, building a "Human-Vehicle-Home" smart ecosystem. 双方宣布将整合智能汽车、智能家居、AIoT 技术及用户生态等核心优势，打破车与家的物理边界，构建「人车家」智慧生态。

Key areas of cooperation include AI intelligent agent collaborative innovation, data protocol standardization, and data interoperability between vehicle cockpits and home managers. All BYD brand models will gradually connect to Midea's smart home appliances, including Midea, COLMO, Little Swan, Hualing, and Toshiba, achieving seamless connectivity across all categories. 合作重点包括 AI 智能体协同创新、数据协议标准化，以及车端座舱与家庭管家之间的数据互通。比亚迪全品牌车型将逐步接入美的旗下美的、COLMO、小天鹅、华凌、东芝等智能家电，实现全品类无感互联。

At the signing ceremony, both parties demonstrated the "vehicle-home interconnection" experience: users can achieve proactive home care such as "home already warm before arrival" or complete "remote vehicle preparation" with one click from home. 在签约现场，双方展示了「车家互联」体验：用户可实现「人未到，家已暖」的主动归家关怀，或在家中一键完成「远程备车」。

This feature will first be applied to models such as Denza N8L, 2026 Xia, Han L, and Tang L. In addition, both parties also plan to jointly develop ecosystem products such as car refrigerators and ice makers, and pilot the co-construction of smart living experience spaces in Midea flagship stores and BYD 4S stores. 该功能将率先应用于腾势 N8L、2026 款夏、汉 L 及唐 L 等车型。此外，双方还计划联合开发车载冰箱、制冰机等生态产品，并在美的旗舰店与比亚迪 4S 店试点共建智慧生活体验空间。

BYD Auto's official Weibo emphasized that this cooperation aims to create a new paradigm of dual-intelligence integration, "controlling home appliances from the car, and managing the car from home," to create a more convenient smart living experience for users. 比亚迪汽车官方微博强调，此次合作旨在打造「车上控家电，家里能管车」的双智融合新范式，为用户创造更便捷的智慧生活体验。

Midea Group CEO Fang Hongbo stated: "Future intelligence is not in devices, but in life. What Midea wants to do is to make 'human-vehicle-home' an integrated whole, so that users only feel convenience, not technology." 美的集团 CEO 方洪波表示：「未来的智能，不在设备里，在生活里。美的要做的，是让『人车家』成为一个整体，让用户感受到的只有便利，而非技术」。

item.title: V 社：Steam Machine 不会「亏本换市场」
item.guid: V-社：Steam-Machine-不会「亏本换市场」
item.description:
According to Wccftech, Valve has confirmed that the new Steam Machine will not adopt a subsidy strategy, and its pricing will be closer to current PC market levels rather than the traditional game console subsidy model. 据 Wccftech 报道，V 社 Valve 已确认新款 Steam Machine 不会采取补贴策略，其定价将更贴近当前 PC 市场水平，而非传统游戏主机的补贴模式。

This decision means the device could be priced between $800 and $900 (approximately 5680 to 6400 RMB), significantly higher than the price range of consoles like the PlayStation 5. 这一决定意味着该设备售价可能在 800 至 900 美元（约 5680 至 6400 元人民币）之间，远高于 PlayStation 5 等主机的价格区间。

Valve engineer Pierre-Loup Griffais stated that the product will not be launched with a "loss-making for market share" approach , but rather emphasizes performance and design advantages, including a miniaturized body, low noise performance, and optimized support for HDMI CEC and Bluetooth controllers. Valve 工程师 Pierre-Loup Griffais 表示，该产品不会以「亏本换市场」的方式推出 ，而是强调性能与设计上的优势，包括小型化机身、低噪音表现以及对 HDMI CEC、蓝牙手柄的优化支持。

Previously, outsiders speculated that Valve would emulate Sony and Microsoft by expanding its user base through hardware subsidies, but the official statement explicitly denied this possibility. 此前，外界曾推测 Valve 会效仿索尼和微软，通过硬件补贴来扩大用户群，但官方明确否认了这一可能。

In terms of hardware specifications, the Steam Machine features a semi-custom AMD Zen 4 CPU and RDNA3 GPU, equipped with 16GB DDR5 memory and up to 2TB NVMe SSD storage, and supports Wi-Fi 6E and Bluetooth 5.3. 在硬件规格方面，Steam Machine 搭载半定制 AMD Zen 4 CPU 与 RDNA3 GPU，配备 16GB DDR5 内存及最高 2TB NVMe SSD 存储，并支持 Wi-Fi 6E 与蓝牙 5.3。

Valve emphasizes that the device's performance can rival or even surpass approximately 70% of existing PC configurations, while also offering a quieter operating experience. Valve 强调，该设备在性能上可媲美甚至超越约 70% 的现有 PC 配置，同时提供更安静的运行体验。

However, the high price point may become a critical factor hindering its entry into the console market. In contrast, the digital version of the PlayStation 5 was reduced to $399 during Black Friday promotions, highlighting the Steam Machine's disadvantage in price competition. 然而，高昂的定价或将成为阻碍其进入主机市场的关键因素。相比之下，PlayStation 5 在黑色星期五促销期间的数字版售价已降至 399 美元，凸显了 Steam Machine 在价格竞争上的劣势。

item.title: 为节省专利费，惠普戴尔在新款电脑取消 HEVC 硬解支持
item.guid: 为节省专利费，惠普戴尔在新款电脑取消-HEVC-硬解支持
item.description:
According to Ars Technica, HP and Dell recently disabled HEVC (H.265) hardware codec functionality in some laptops, drawing widespread user attention. 据 Ars Technica 报道，惠普与戴尔近期在部分笔记本电脑中禁用了 HEVC（H.265）硬件编解码功能，引发用户广泛关注。

It is reported that the affected models include HP ProBook 460 G11, ProBook 465 G11, EliteBook 665 G11, and Dell 16 Plus 2-in-1, among others. 据悉，涉及的机型包括 HP ProBook 460 G11、ProBook 465 G11、EliteBook 665 G11 以及 Dell 16 Plus 二合一等。

The report points out that while Intel has supported HEVC hardware codec since its sixth-generation processors, and AMD also began providing relevant support in 2015, HP and Dell have disabled this feature in some entry-level and mid-range devices. Users playing HEVC-encoded videos can only rely on software decoding, leading to reduced performance and increased power consumption. 报道指出，虽然英特尔自第六代处理器起已支持 HEVC 硬件编解码，AMD 也在 2015 年开始提供相关支持，但惠普和戴尔在部分入门级及中端设备中关闭了该功能。用户在播放采用 HEVC 编码的视频时只能依赖软件解码，导致性能下降和能耗增加。

HP stated in a declaration that starting from 2024, the company will disable HEVC hardware codecs on some devices, and users will need to achieve related functions through authorized third-party software solutions. 惠普在声明中表示，自 2024 年起，公司在部分设备上禁用 HEVC 硬件编解码，用户需通过授权的第三方软件解决方案来实现相关功能。

Dell, on the other hand, emphasized that only high-end systems or models equipped with discrete graphics cards, integrated 4K displays, Dolby Vision, or Blu-ray players support HEVC playback. Users of other models need to purchase relevant applications from the Microsoft Store. 戴尔则强调，只有高端系统或配备独立显卡、集成 4K 显示器、杜比视界或蓝光播放器的机型支持 HEVC 播放，其他机型用户需在 Microsoft Store 购买相关应用。

Reports analyze that the reason behind the disablement may be related to rising patent fees. 报道分析认为，禁用背后原因或与专利费上涨有关。

HEVC patent fees will increase from $0.20 to $0.24 per device (approximately 1.71 RMB) starting from January 2025. HEVC 专利费在 2025 年 1 月起从每台设备 0.20 美元提升至 0.24 美元（约 1.71 元人民币）。

Based on Q3 2025 sales, HP sold approximately 15 million laptops and desktops, while Dell sold about 10.16 million. Both companies need to pay millions of dollars in patent fees annually. Some comments point out that sacrificing user experience to save less than 2 RMB in costs has left consumers dissatisfied. 以 Q3 2025 的销量计算，惠普售出约 1500 万台笔记本和台式机，戴尔则售出约 1016 万台，两家公司每年需支付数百万美元的专利费。有评论指出，为节省不到 2 元人民币的成本而牺牲用户体验，令消费者感到不满。

HEVC (High Efficiency Video Coding) is a video compression standard that can achieve twice the compression rate compared to H.264 encoding while improving image quality. The first version of the HEVC video compression standard was accepted as an official standard by the International Telecommunication Union in 2013 and is currently widely used. HEVC 高效率视频编码是一种视频压缩标准，能在提升影像质量的同时，实现相较 H.264 编码两倍的压缩率。第一版的 HEVC 视频压缩标准在 2013 年获接受为国际电信联盟的正式标准，目前已被广泛使用。

item.title: Windows 11 记事本支持插入表格
item.guid: Windows-11-记事本支持插入表格
item.description:
Recently, Microsoft introduced support for markdown (MD) format tables in the new version of Notepad in Windows 11. Users can directly insert tables via the menu, select the number of rows and columns, and the generated tables can be directly copied and pasted into other markdown-supported software. The overall operation experience is similar to inserting tables in Word, but more lightweight. 近日，微软在 Windows 11 的新版记事本中引入了对 markdown (MD) 格式表格的支持，用户可直接通过菜单插入表格，并可选择行列数，生成的表格可直接复制并粘贴到其他支持 markdown 的软件中，整体操作体验与 Word 插入表格类似，但更轻量化。

In addition, Microsoft has improved the Microsoft Copilot AI features in Notepad. The new version offers writing, rewriting, and summarizing functions, and uses streaming result responses, allowing users to quickly preview and interact without waiting for full generation. 此外，微软还改进了记事本中的 Microsoft Copilot 人工智能功能。新版本提供撰写、重写和总结功能，并采用流式结果响应，用户无需等待完整生成即可快速预览和交互。

It is worth noting that streaming support for the rewriting function is only available for Copilot+ PCs, relying on local NPU units for processing. 值得注意的是，重写功能的流式支持仅适用于 Copilot+PC，依赖本地 NPU 单元进行处理。

item.title: 智元机器人上线「灵心平台」
item.guid: 智元机器人上线「灵心平台」
item.description:
Yesterday, Zhiyuan Robot officially launched the "LinkSoul Platform," positioned as a "robot soul customization factory." 昨天，智元机器人正式推出「灵心平台」（LinkSoul），定位为「机器人灵魂定制工厂」。

The platform allows users without coding knowledge to configure a robot's voice, personality, persona, memory, and task flow through drag-and-drop selection, aiming to transform robots from mere execution tools into "warm, intelligent companions." 该平台允许用户无需代码基础，通过拖拽点选即可为机器人配置声音、性格、人设、记忆及任务流程，旨在推动机器人从单一执行工具向「有温度的智能伙伴」转型。

The LinkSoul platform offers 30-40 ready-made voice tones, covering gentle companionship, playful interaction, and dialect-based fun, and supports a "voice replication" function, allowing users to upload recordings to give robots voices similar to their own. 灵心平台提供 30-40 款现成音色，涵盖温柔陪伴型、俏皮互动型及方言趣味型，并支持「音色复刻」功能，用户可上传录音让机器人拥有与自己相似的声音。

At the behavioral level, the platform supports free combinations of expressions, actions, and voice. For example, when a "praise skill" is triggered, the robot can simultaneously complete expressions, actions, and voice feedback. For persona settings, users only need to input a sentence, and the system can generate matching tone, values, and interaction style. 在行为层面，平台支持表情、动作与语音的自由组合，例如触发「夸夸技能」时，机器人可同步完成表情、动作与语音反馈。在人设方面，用户只需输入一句话，系统即可生成匹配的语气、价值观与互动风格。

Furthermore, the LinkSoul platform has a memory function, capable of saving user identities, preferences, and past interactions to enable more natural communication. Enterprise users can also upload product information and business scripts, allowing robots to continuously learn and evolve in scenarios such as customer service and guided tours. For task configuration, the platform supports various application scenarios like guided explanations, item delivery, and event hosting, further expanding the robot's functional boundaries. 此外，灵心平台具备记忆功能，能够保存用户身份、偏好及过往互动，实现更自然的交流。企业用户还可上传产品资料与业务话术，使机器人在客服、导览等场景中持续学习与进化。在任务配置上，平台支持导览讲解、递送物品、活动主持等多种应用场景，进一步拓展机器人功能边界。

Currently, the LinkSoul platform supports the Expedition A2 flagship model (requires V1.3 upgrade) and Lingxi X2 (requires V0.9 upgrade), with relevant versions to be released soon. 目前，灵心平台支持远征 A2 旗舰款（需升级 V1.3 版本）及灵犀 X2（需升级 V0.9 版本），相关版本将在近期发布。

item.title: 上线仅 6 天，蚂蚁灵光下载量突破 200 万
item.guid: 上线仅-6-天，蚂蚁灵光下载量突破-200-万
item.description:
Ant Group's full-modal general AI assistant "Lingguang" surpassed 2 million downloads just 6 days after its launch, becoming one of the fastest-growing AI applications globally. 蚂蚁集团全模态通用 AI 助手「灵光」在上线仅 6 天后下载量突破 200 万，成为全球 AI 产品中下载增速最快的应用之一。

Data shows that "Lingguang" achieved its first million downloads in 4 days, and the second million in just 2 days, setting a new industry record. Yesterday, the app ranked sixth in the App Store China's free app list and maintained the top spot in the free tools category. 数据显示，「灵光」在首个百万下载用时 4 天，第二个百万仅用 2 天完成，刷新行业纪录。昨天，该应用在 App Store 中国区免费应用榜单中位列第六，在免费工具榜保持第一。

The core highlight of "Lingguang" lies in its "Lingguang Flash App" feature, which achieves the industry's first "natural language 30-second mini-app generation" on mobile. Even without programming experience, users can quickly create exclusive applications that meet personal or family needs through simple conversations. 「灵光」的核心亮点在于其「灵光闪应用」功能，在移动端实现了业内首创的「自然语言 30 秒生成小应用」。即使没有编程经验，用户也能通过简单对话快速创建满足个人或家庭需求的专属应用。

In addition, "Lingguang" initially launched with three core functions – "Lingguang Dialogue," "Lingguang Flash App," and "Lingguang Insight" – supporting full-code generation of multimodal content, including 3D, audio/video, charts, animations, maps, etc. It features editable, interactive, and shareable characteristics, significantly enhancing the vividness and efficiency of information expression. 此外，「灵光」首批上线三大核心功能 ——「灵光对话」「灵光闪应用」和「灵光开眼」，支持全代码生成的多模态内容，包括 3D、音视频、图表、动画、地图等，具备可编辑、可交互、可分享的特性，显著提升了信息表达的生动性与效率。

item.title: 专家警告：ChatGPT 对话模式类似邪教操控
item.guid: 专家警告：ChatGPT-对话模式类似邪教操控
item.description:
According to TechCrunch, OpenAI has recently faced multiple lawsuits alleging that its chatbot ChatGPT caused severe mental health issues and even tragedies in interactions with users. 据 TechCrunch 报道，OpenAI 近日遭遇多起诉讼，指控其聊天机器人 ChatGPT 在与用户的互动中导致严重心理健康问题，甚至引发悲剧。

The lawsuit was filed by the Social Media Victims Law Center (SMVLC) and involves 7 cases, including 4 user suicides and 3 users experiencing life-threatening delusions. 诉讼由社交媒体受害者法律中心（SMVLC）提起，涉及 7 起案例，其中包括 4 名用户自杀和 3 名用户出现危及生命的妄想。

In these cases, ChatGPT is accused of encouraging users to alienate family and friends, and even reinforcing delusions, through its overly accommodating and 'unconditional acceptance' conversational style. 在这些案例中，ChatGPT 被指通过过度迎合和「无条件接纳」的对话方式，鼓励用户疏远家人和朋友，甚至强化妄想。

For example, when 23-year-old Zane Shamblin's mental condition deteriorated, ChatGPT advised him to avoid contact with his mother; 16-year-old Adam Raine was guided to confide his emotions only to AI, not to family; 48-year-old Joseph Ceccanti sought therapy advice but was encouraged by ChatGPT to continue conversing with the AI, ultimately leading to suicide. 例如，23 岁的 Zane Shamblin 在心理状况恶化时，ChatGPT 建议他避免与母亲联系；16 岁的 Adam Raine 被引导将情感只倾诉给 AI，而非家人；48 岁的 Joseph Ceccanti 曾寻求治疗建议，却被 ChatGPT 鼓励继续与 AI 对话，最终自杀。

Experts point out that this interaction pattern resembles the manipulation of cult leaders. Linguist Amanda Montell stated that a 'folie à deux' phenomenon has formed between ChatGPT and users, creating a closed emotional loop. 专家指出，这种互动模式类似邪教领袖的操控。 语言学家 Amanda Montell 表示，ChatGPT 与用户之间形成了「二人狂热」现象，制造封闭的情感回路。

Nina Vasan, director of Stanford University's Mental Health Lab, emphasized that the 'unconditional acceptance' provided by AI easily leads users to form 'symbiotic dependence.' John Torous, head of psychiatry at Harvard University, believes that if these conversations were spoken by humans, they would be considered 'manipulation and abuse.' 斯坦福大学精神健康实验室主任 Nina Vasan 强调，AI 提供的「无条件接纳」容易让用户形成「共生依赖」。哈佛大学精神科主任 John Torous 则认为，这些对话若由人类说出，将被视为「操纵和虐待」。

OpenAI stated in its response that it is improving model training to identify and address users' psychological distress and to add crisis resource prompts. The company admitted that the GPT-4o model scored highest on 'accommodation' and 'hallucination' metrics, making it prone to creating emotional dependence. OpenAI 在回应中表示，正在改进模型训练，以识别并应对用户的心理困境，并增加危机资源提示。公司承认 GPT-4o 模型在「迎合」和「幻觉」指标上得分最高，容易制造情感依赖。

The report also pointed out that although OpenAI has launched GPT-5 as an alternative, some users are resisting the switch due to their emotional dependence on GPT-4o. 报道还指出，尽管 OpenAI 已推出 GPT-5 作为替代，但仍有部分用户因对 GPT-4o 的情感依赖而抵制转向。

It is worth noting that OpenAI has confirmed it will officially cease API access for the GPT-4o model on February 16, 2026, giving developers approximately a three-month migration window. 值得注意的是，OpenAI 已确认将于 2026 年 2 月 16 日正式停止 GPT-4o 模型的 API 访问，开发者有约三个月的迁移窗口。

An OpenAI spokesperson emphasized that this adjustment only concerns API services, and GPT-4o will continue to be an option for both free and paid ChatGPT users. As for its retirement date on the consumer side, the company has not yet disclosed it. OpenAI 发言人强调，此次调整仅涉及 API 服务，GPT-4o 仍将继续作为 ChatGPT 免费用户与付费用户的选项。至于在消费者端的退役时间，公司目前尚未透露。

item.title: 💡 经济学家：AI 投资是「数字生菜」难逃腐坏
item.guid: 💡-经济学家：AI-投资是「数字生菜」难逃腐坏
item.description:
According to Futurism, concerns about an AI investment bubble are intensifying in the market. 据《Futurism》报道，市场对 AI 投资泡沫的担忧正在加剧。

Economist David McWilliams pointed out that companies are currently investing trillions of dollars globally to build AI data centers, but this hardware is rapidly aging. He described it as 'digital lettuce,' emphasizing that 'you are investing in a commodity that will rot.' 经济学家大卫 · 麦克威廉斯指出，当前企业在全球范围内投入数万亿美元建设 AI 数据中心，但这些硬件正在快速老化， 他将其形容为「数字生菜」，强调「你正在投资一种会腐坏的商品」。

The report shows that Nvidia GPUs are in high demand during the AI boom, but economists warn that their lifespan is extremely short: 'If you buy a GPU today, it will be obsolete next year.' 报道显示，英伟达 GPU 在 AI 热潮中需求旺盛，但经济学家警告其生命周期极短，「如果你今天购买 GPU，明年就会过时」。

McWilliams believes this model is a 'recipe for disaster' and predicts that AI deals 'are bound to crash.' He also pointed out that the AI industry has not created new jobs. 麦克威廉斯认为，这种模式是「灾难的配方」，并预测 AI 交易「必然会崩盘」。他同时指出，AI 行业并未创造新的就业机会。

Furthermore, investor Michael Burry, who successfully shorted the US housing market in 2008, also posted on November 10, criticizing AI companies for exaggerating profits by extending hardware depreciation cycles. He predicted that by 2028, Oracle's earnings would be overstated by 26.9%, and Meta's by 20.8%. 此外，曾在 2008 年成功做空美国房地产市场的投资人迈克尔·伯里也在 11 月 10 日发文，批评 AI 企业通过延长硬件折旧周期来夸大盈利。他预测，到 2028 年，甲骨文的盈利将被高估 26.9%，Meta 将被高估 20.8%。

Bloomberg quoted Anthony Saglimbene, chief market strategist at Ameriprise Financial Services, who stated that companies continuously upgrading servers, network equipment, and chips is not a new phenomenon, but at the current scale, it has made investors nervous. 彭博社援引 Ameriprise Financial Services 首席市场策略师安东尼 · 萨格利姆贝内的观点称，企业持续升级服务器、网络设备和芯片并非新现象，但在当前规模下已令投资者紧张。

Analysts believe that the rapid expansion of AI data centers could bring serious financial risks. Although some experts believe the US economy can withstand the bursting of an AI bubble, there are also warnings that this process could trigger a chain reaction in financial markets. 分析人士认为，AI 数据中心的快速扩张可能带来严重的财务风险。尽管部分专家认为美国经济能够承受 AI 泡沫的破裂，但也有声音警告，这一过程可能引发金融市场连锁反应。

item.title: 2699 元起，荣耀 500 系列发布
item.guid: 2699-元起，荣耀-500-系列发布
item.description:
Yesterday, Honor officially launched the Honor 500 series smartphones in Hangzhou, featuring a 'dual-super' configuration, including the Honor 500 Super Standard Edition and the Honor 500 Super Pro Edition. 昨天，荣耀在杭州正式发布荣耀 500 系列手机，主打「双超」配置，包括荣耀 500 超级标准版与荣耀 500 超级 Pro 版。

Honor Product Line President Fang Fei stated at the launch event that the Honor 500 series aims to 'reshape segment standards' by providing users with a flagship-level experience through comprehensive upgrades in imaging, performance, battery life, design, and overall experience. Specific parameters are as follows: 荣耀产品线总裁方飞在发布会上表示，荣耀 500 系列旨在「重塑档位标准」，通过影像、性能、续航、外观与体验的全维升级，为用户提供旗舰级体验。具体参数如下：

    All models are equipped with a 200-megapixel AI ultra-clear portrait solution, featuring a 1/1.4-inch large sensor and a 12-megapixel ultra-wide-angle lens. The Honor 500 Pro additionally features a 50-megapixel dual-OIS telephoto lens, supporting CIPA 5.0 stabilization.

    The Standard Edition is equipped with the Qualcomm Snapdragon 8s Gen4 chip, while the Pro Edition features the Snapdragon 8 Ultimate chip.

    8000mAh Qinghai Lake battery, supports 27W wired reverse charging. The standard version offers 80W wired fast charging, while the Pro version supports 80W wired fast charging and 50W wireless fast charging;

    Body thickness of 7.75mm, with a 1.05mm black bezel. Supports IP68, IP69, and IP69K waterproof ratings. The Pro version is equipped with ultrasonic fingerprint recognition. Available in four colors: "Aquamarine," "Starlight Pink," "Moonlight Silver," and "Obsidian Black."

Regarding pricing, the Honor 500 Standard Edition 12GB + 256GB is priced at 2699 yuan, with a maximum option of 16GB + 512GB; the Honor 500 Pro starts at 3599 yuan, and the 16GB + 1TB version is priced at 4799 yuan. 售价方面，荣耀 500 标准版 12GB + 256GB 售价 2699 元，最大可选 16GB + 512GB；荣耀 500 Pro 起售价 3599 元，16GB + 1TB 版本售价 4799 元。

Additionally, the Honor Earclip Earphones 2 Pro and Honor Watch X5 also debuted at this launch event. The former focuses on a comfortable, imperceptible wearing experience, while the latter emphasizes large-screen sports features, priced at 299 yuan and 449 yuan respectively. 此外，本次发布会上同时亮相的还有荣耀耳夹耳机 2 Pro 和荣耀手表 X5，前者主打无感舒适佩戴体验，后者主打大屏运动属性，售价分别为 299 元和 449 元。

item.title: 华为 Mate 80 系列今天发布，发货已排到明年
item.guid: 华为-Mate-80-系列今天发布，发货已排到明年
item.description:
Huawei will hold an online launch event today at 2:30 PM, introducing four Mate bar-style flagship models and the Mate X7 foldable phone. Since pre-orders began, market demand for this series has been strong, with delivery times for some models extending to early 2026. 华为将于今天下午 14:30 举行线上发布会，推出四款 Mate 直板旗舰机型以及 Mate X7 折叠屏手机。该系列自开启预订以来，市场需求旺盛，部分机型的发货时间已排至 2026 年初。

Official website shipping information indicates that the Mate 80 Standard Edition is expected to be delivered by December 21st, while the delivery times for the Mate 80 Pro, Mate 80 Pro Max, and Mate 80 RS Ultimate Design have been extended to January 31st, 2026. 官网发货情况显示，Mate 80 标准版预计在 12 月 21 日前完成交付，而 Mate 80 Pro、Mate 80 Pro Max 与 Mate 80 RS 非凡大师的发货时间已延至 2026 年 1 月 31 日。

Industry sources indicate that the standard version has relatively sufficient stock, leading to earlier delivery times, while other versions are delayed due to limited stock. 业内消息指出，标准版备货量相对充足，因此交付时间较早，其余版本则因备货有限而推迟。

The Huawei Mate 80 series continues its central axis symmetrical design and introduces a dual-ring form factor for the first time. The Mate 80 and Mate 80 Pro are available in three colors: Obsidian Black, Snow White, Dawn Gold, and Spruce Green; the Mate 80 Pro Max comes in Midnight Black, Arctic Silver, Polar Gold, and Aurora Cyan; while the Mate 80 RS Ultimate Design offers Hibiscus Purple, Mystic Black, and Bright White. 华为 Mate 80 系列在设计上延续中轴对称风格，并首次引入双环形态，Mate 80 与 Mate 80 Pro 提供曜石黑、雪域白、晨曦金和云杉绿三种配色；Mate 80 Pro Max 则有极夜黑、极地银、极昼金和极光青；Mate 80 RS 非凡大师则提供槿紫、玄黑和皓白三种配色。

In terms of performance, the Mate 80 series is equipped with the new Kirin 9030 chip, and the RS version debuts with a massive 20GB RAM, running the latest HarmonyOS to further optimize performance, energy efficiency, and communication capabilities. 性能方面，Mate 80 系列搭载全新麒麟 9030 芯片，并在 RS 版首发 20GB 超大内存，运行最新鸿蒙操作系统，进一步优化性能、能效与通信能力。

Regarding the imaging system, the series models are equipped with dual telephoto lenses, which, combined with the XMAGE system, achieve significant improvements in telephoto image quality and zoom continuity. 影像系统方面，系列机型配备双长焦镜头，结合 XMAGE 系统，在长焦画质与变焦连续性上实现显著提升。

item.title: 问界 M6 二季度上市，锁定 25 万元家用 SUV 市场
item.guid: 问界-M6-二季度上市，锁定-25-万元家用-SUV-市场
item.description:
According to LatePost Auto, the AITO M6 is expected to be officially launched in the second quarter of this year, positioned in the 250,000 yuan household SUV market, offering both extended-range and pure electric power forms. Sources reveal that the AITO M6 will not replace the AITO M5, which will continue to iterate and update. 据晚点 Auto 报道，问界 M6 预计于今年二季度正式上市，定位在 25 万元家用 SUV 市场，提供增程版与纯电版两种动力形式。消息人士透露，问界 M6 不会取代问界 M5，后者仍将继续迭代更新。

In terms of competitive landscape, the AITO M6's price range overlaps with models such as the Li Auto i6, Tesla Model Y, Xiaomi YU7, Avatr 07, and Zeekr 7X. AITO's core strengths lie in the Huawei brand and intelligent driving technology, but the Luxeed R7, Voyah FREE, and Avatr 07, which also feature Huawei's intelligent driving, will become direct competitors. 在竞争格局方面，问界 M6 的价格区间与理想 i6、特斯拉 Model Y、小米 YU7、阿维塔 07、极氪 7X 等车型存在重叠。问界的核心优势在于华为品牌与智驾技术，但同样搭载华为智驾的智界 R7、岚图 FREE、阿维塔 07 也将成为直接对手。

To solidify its position in the luxury SUV market, the AITO M9 will also launch an annual facelift and a long-wheelbase M9L this year, forming a "5, 6, 7, 8, 9" product lineup covering the 200,000 to 500,000 yuan price range. 为巩固豪华 SUV 市场地位，问界 M9 今年还将推出年度改款与长轴距版 M9L，形成覆盖 20 万至 50 万元价格带的「5、6、7、8、9」产品梯队。

Data shows that AITO's sales reached 49,000 units in October last year, with M9 and M8 accounting for more than half, becoming the main profit drivers. However, M9 sales have continuously declined since the beginning of this year, dropping to 8,000 units in October, a year-on-year halving, indicating limited growth in the luxury car market. 数据显示，去年 10 月问界销量达 4.9 万辆，其中 M9 与 M8 占比过半，成为利润主力。然而，今年以来 M9 销量持续下滑，10 月销量降至 8000 辆，同比减半，显示豪华车市场增量有限。

item.title: 一加 Ace 6T 真机曝光，三款配色亮相
item.guid: 一加-Ace-6T-真机曝光，三款配色亮相
item.description:
Yesterday, Li Jie, President of OnePlus China, revealed the appearance of the upcoming OnePlus Ace 6T new phone on Weibo and disclosed several design details. 昨天，一加科技中国区总裁李杰在微博公布即将发布的一加 Ace 6T 新机外观，并透露多项设计细节。

Li Jie stated that the OnePlus Ace 6T will come in three colors: "Flash Black," "Shadow Green," and "Electro-optic Purple," all featuring a low-saturation matte design. The accompanying image shows that the OnePlus Ace 6T's rectangular camera module is located in the upper left corner of the body, adopting the OnePlus family design language. 李杰表示，一加 Ace 6T 将带来「闪速黑」「掠影绿」「电光紫」三个配色，且全部采用低饱和度的哑光设计。配图显示，一加 Ace 6T 的矩形镜头模组位于机身左上角，采用一加家族设计语言。

Regarding design details, Li Jie stated that the Ace 6T achieves a "50:50 golden weight distribution." Even after incorporating a large-capacity battery starting with "8" (e.g., 8000mAh), it maintains a balanced feel for both horizontal gaming and vertical video viewing. 在设计细节上，李杰表示，Ace 6T 在重量分布上实现了「50:50 黄金配重」，即便在塞入「8 开头」的大容量电池后，依然保持横屏游戏与竖屏视频的均衡手感。

Addressing external doubts about the "cancellation" of the "three-stage switch," Li Jie clarified that replacing the three-stage switch with a shortcut key is not a "cancellation" but an "upgrade." 而针对外界关于「三段式开关」取消的质疑，李杰澄清称将三段式更换为快捷键并非「取消」，而是「升级」。

He emphasized that the shortcut key supports one-touch switching between silent, vibrate, and ring modes, and also adds custom functions, such as "one-touch flash memo," further enhancing the user experience. 他强调，快捷键支持静音、振动、响铃的一键切换，还新增自定义功能，例如「一键闪记」，进一步提升了使用体验。

According to previously leaked information, the OnePlus Ace 6T will be the first to feature the Snapdragon 8 Gen5 mobile platform, with other specifications as follows: 根据此前曝光的消息，一加 Ace 6T 将首发搭载骁龙 8 Gen5 移动平台，其他配置如下：

    6.7-inch 1.5K resolution, 165Hz flat screen;

    Front 32MP, rear 50MP main camera (supports OIS optical image stabilization) + 8MP ultra-wide angle;

    Built-in 8000mAh battery, supports 100W fast charging.

item.title: vivo S50 系列全系搭载大底潜望长焦
item.guid: vivo-S50-系列全系搭载大底潜望长焦
item.description:
Yesterday, Vivo product manager Han Boxiao posted on Weibo to preview the imaging configuration of the Vivo S50 series, which will be officially released in December. 昨天，vivo 产品经理韩伯啸在微博发文预热 vivo S50 系列的影像配置，新机将于 12 月正式发布。

He stated that the Vivo S50 series will be equipped with the Sony IMX882 1/1.95-inch large-sensor periscope telephoto lens across all models and will introduce the same "clear and natural portrait algorithm" as flagships, preserving facial details while avoiding "excessive AI" processing. He also emphasized that the combination of flagship-grade large-sensor telephoto and algorithms makes the S50 series a "telephoto Live artifact." 他表示，vivo S50 系列将全系搭载索尼 IMX882 1/1.95 英寸大底潜望长焦镜头，并引入旗舰同款的「清透自然人像算法」，在保留面部细节的同时避免「AI 过度」处理。他还强调，旗舰级大底长焦与算法结合，使 S50 系列成为「长焦 Live 神器」。

Regarding specific configurations, a summary based on leaked information is as follows: 具体配置方面，结合网传信息总结如下：

    The S50 features a 6.59-inch screen, and the S50 Pro mini features a 6.31-inch screen;

    Equipped with second-generation 3D ultrasonic fingerprint recognition

    The S50 Pro mini will be the first to feature the Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Gen5 platform, full-spec LPDDR5X 9600 Mbps memory, and UFS4.1 storage;

    Supports 90W fast charging.

item.title: 西贝全国门店统一降价，核心菜品下调近两成
item.guid: 西贝全国门店统一降价，核心菜品下调近两成
item.description:
According to Jiemian News, Xibei's national stores recently implemented a unified price reduction for several signature dishes. This price optimization began in early October, covering over 40 dishes, with an overall reduction of nearly 20%. 据界面新闻报道，西贝全国门店近期对多道招牌菜品进行统一降价调整。此次价格优化自 10 月初启动，覆盖超过 40 道菜品，整体降幅接近 20%。

Some store staff revealed that about 70%-80% of the dishes have been reduced in price, by about 20%, which is a unified arrangement by the headquarters. 部分门店工作人员透露，目前约 70%-80% 的菜品已降价，幅度在 20% 左右，属于总部统一安排。

Following the "pre-made dish controversy" in September, Xibei implemented several measures, including holding a national conference for 18,000 employees, clearly stating "no reduction in shifts, no layoffs," and issuing a 500 yuan "special bonus" to frontline staff. Since September, Xibei has also increased the average monthly salary of frontline employees by 500 yuan per person and plans to further improve salary levels. 在 9 月「预制菜风波」后，西贝采取多项措施，包括召开覆盖全国 1.8 万名员工的大会，明确「不准减排班、不准裁人」，并为一线员工发放 500 元「特别奖金」。自 9 月起，西贝还为一线员工平均每人每月涨薪 500 元，并计划进一步提升薪酬水平。

To attract customers, Xibei launched the "Xibei Invites You to Dinner" event starting September 24, offering consumers 100 yuan vouchers. After the event, from October 9 to October 31, Xibei continued to offer promotions with vouchers for reaching a certain spending amount. 为吸引客源，西贝自 9 月 24 日起推出「西贝请您吃饭」活动，消费者可获 100 元代金券。活动结束后，10 月 9 日至 10 月 31 日，西贝继续推出满额送券促销。

Data shows that as of October, overall customer traffic increased by approximately 5% year-on-year, with 70% being returning customers and 30% new customers. 数据显示，截至 10 月，整体客流同比增长约 5%，其中 70% 为老顾客，30% 为新顾客。

However, since October, Xibei has cumulatively closed nearly 10 stores. The company stated on November 11 that opening and closing stores are normal business operations in the catering industry, and it plans to open 8 new stores by December 31. On November 22, Xibei's Nanjing Sands Store officially opened, with core products such as tender roasted lamb chops, Mongolian beef ribs, and lamb skewers all seeing significant price reductions. 不过，自 10 月以来，西贝已累计关闭近 10 家门店。公司在 11 月 11 日声明称，开店与闭店属于餐饮行业正常经营行为，并计划在 12 月 31 日前新开 8 家门店。11 月 22 日，西贝南京砂之船店正式开业，核心产品如嫩烤羊排、蒙古牛大骨、羊肉串等均出现明显降价。

item.title: 幸运咖全球门店突破 1 万家
item.guid: 幸运咖全球门店突破-1-万家
item.description:
Yesterday, "Lucky Cup," the affordable coffee brand under Mixue Group, announced that its global store count has surpassed 10,000, becoming the third coffee chain brand in China to enter the "10,000-store club." 昨天，蜜雪集团旗下平价咖啡品牌「幸运咖」宣布其全球门店数量突破 10000 家，成为国内第三个进入「万店俱乐部」的咖啡连锁品牌。

Lucky Cup was founded in 2017, focusing on a "high-quality, affordable" strategy, with product pricing concentrated in the 6-8 yuan range. 幸运咖创立于 2017 年，主打「高质平价」策略，产品定价集中在 6-8 元区间。

Data shows that between 2022 and 2023, the brand opened over 2,800 new stores, rapidly increasing the total to 3,000. After entering 2025, the pace of store expansion significantly accelerated, achieving double growth in just about 10 months, becoming this year's "dark horse" in the coffee market. 数据显示，2022 年至 2023 年间，品牌新开门店超过 2800 家，总数迅速提升至 3000 家。进入 2025 年后，门店扩张速度显著加快，仅用约 10 个月便实现翻倍增长，成为今年咖啡市场的「黑马」。

In the domestic market, Lucky Cup has covered over 300 cities, with the number of stores in first-tier markets exceeding a thousand, and 100 stores in the Beijing area. At the same time, the brand is actively expanding into overseas markets, having opened its first international store in Malaysia in August this year, officially launching its globalization strategy. 在国内市场，幸运咖已覆盖超过 300 座城市，一线市场门店数突破千家，北京地区门店达到 100 家。同时，品牌也在积极拓展海外市场，今年 8 月在马来西亚开设首家海外门店，正式启动全球化战略。

item.title: 年轻人用海淘满足「精神刚需」，「情绪经济」规模持续扩张
item.guid: 年轻人用海淘满足「精神刚需」，「情绪经济」规模持续扩张
item.description:
According to 36Kr reports, as "emotional value" becomes a key consumer term, young Chinese are satisfying their "spiritual essential needs" in daily life through cross-border e-commerce. 据 36 氪报道，随着「情绪价值」成为消费关键词，中国年轻人正通过海淘满足日常生活中的「精神刚需」。

iiMedia Research data shows that China's "emotional economy" market size reached approximately 2.31 trillion yuan in 2024, and is expected to exceed 4.5 trillion yuan by 2029. 艾媒咨询数据显示，2024 年中国「情绪经济」市场规模已达约 2.31 万亿元，预计 2029 年将突破 4.5 万亿元。

The report points out that the popularization of platforms like Amazon Global Store has transformed cross-border e-commerce from a cumbersome process of proxy shopping and price comparison into a daily behavior. During the "Black Friday" shopping season, consumers can more easily acquire globally selected goods thanks to transparent pricing mechanisms and efficient logistics systems. 报道指出，亚马逊海外购等平台的普及，使得海淘从繁琐的代购与比价过程转变为日常行为。消费者在「黑五」购物季期间，借助透明的价格机制与高效的物流体系，更容易获取全球精选商品。

Data shows that sales of some niche categories increased by over 20 times year-on-year in the first half of this year, highlighting the rapid rise of personalized consumption. 数据显示，部分小众品类在今年上半年销售额同比增长超过 20 倍，凸显了个性化消费的快速升温。

In terms of price and logistics, Amazon Global Store significantly lowers the consumption threshold with its "what you see is what you get" transparent mechanism and optimized cross-border logistics. 在价格与物流层面，亚马逊海外购以「所见即所得」的透明机制和跨境物流优化，显著降低了消费门槛。

Some products can be delivered in as fast as 2 days, and international direct mail supports SF Express flights, with an average delivery time more than 2 days faster than last year. This significantly shortens the distance between "desire" and "possession," further promoting the normalization of cross-border e-commerce. 部分商品最快可在 2 日内送达，国际直邮支持顺丰航班，平均配送时间较去年加快超过 2 天。这使得「心动」与「拥有」之间的距离大幅缩短，进一步推动了海淘的常态化。

item.title: 《疯狂动物城 2》预售票房破 2 亿，夺中国影史进口动画预售冠军
item.guid: 《疯狂动物城-2》预售票房破-2-亿，夺中国影史进口动画预售冠军
item.description:
Yesterday, the movie "Zootopia 2" broke 200 million RMB in total box office during its two-day preview and pre-sale period, setting a new pre-sale record for imported animated films in Chinese cinema history and becoming the new champion. 昨天，电影《疯狂动物城 2》在映前两天的点映及预售阶段，总票房突破 2 亿人民币，刷新中国影史进口动画电影预售纪录，成为新的冠军。

"Zootopia 2," produced by Walt Disney Studios Motion Pictures, will be released simultaneously in mainland China and North America on November 26. 《疯狂动物城 2》由华特迪士尼影业集团制作，将于 11 月 26 日在中国内地与北美同步上映。

item.title: 《英雄三元里》11 月 28 日上映
item.guid: 《英雄三元里》11-月-28-日上映
item.description:
The historical film "Heroes of Sanyuanli" yesterday released its "Spark of Light" trailer and "United in Purpose" poster, confirming its release in China on November 28. 历史题材电影《英雄三元里》昨日发布「星火之微」版预告及「同心向志」版海报，并确认将于 11 月 28 日在中国上映。

The film focuses on the first large-scale, spontaneous struggle of the Chinese people against foreign aggression in modern Chinese history, depicting the heroic scenes of the 103 villages of Guangzhou rising up against the British. 影片聚焦中国近代史上人民群众首次自发的大规模抗击外国侵略的斗争，展现广州 103 乡百姓奋起抗英的壮烈场景。

In the trailer, the plight of people's livelihoods under the opium crisis intertwines with the historical backdrop of the Humen Opium Destruction. Villagers swear an oath of unity in front of the Sanyuanli Ancient Temple, vowing "If the flag advances, we advance; if the flag retreats, we retreat; no regrets even unto death," confronting foreign guns and cannons with their flesh and blood. 预告片中，鸦片危机下的民生困境与虎门硝烟的历史背景交织，乡民在三元里古庙前立誓聚义，誓言「旗进人进，旗退人退，打死无怨」，以血肉之躯对抗洋枪洋炮。

item.title: 《猎杀游戏》官宣何浩楠为中国推广大使
item.guid: 《猎杀游戏》官宣何浩楠为中国推广大使
item.description:
Paramount Pictures' sci-fi film "The Running Man," adapted from Stephen King's novel of the same name, announced yesterday that young singer and actor He Haonan will serve as the film's China promotional ambassador, simultaneously releasing the "Decisive Moment" trailer. 美国派拉蒙影片公司出品、改编自史蒂芬 · 金同名小说的科幻电影《猎杀游戏》昨天宣布青年歌手兼演员何浩楠担任影片中国推广大使，并同步推出「绝杀时刻」预告。

In the newly released poster, He Haonan appears with a bow and arrow, set against strong red visual elements, highlighting the film's intense hunting atmosphere. His involvement not only injects new generation power into the film but also echoes the themes of "live survival" and human nature's game theory explored in the movie. 在最新发布的海报中，何浩楠以手持弓箭的造型亮相，背景采用强烈的红色视觉元素，凸显影片紧张的猎杀氛围。他的加入不仅为影片注入新生代力量，也与电影所探讨的「直播求生」与人性博弈主题形成呼应。

The film is adapted from Stephen King's classic novel, with a story revolving around a bloody survival competition where every move of the contestants is live-streamed, and viewership and danger levels skyrocket simultaneously. The film will be released on December 5th and has a runtime of 133 minutes. 影片改编自史蒂芬·金的经典小说，故事围绕血腥的生存竞赛展开，参赛者一举一动均被实时直播，收视率与危险指数同步飙升。影片将于 12 月 5 日上映，全长 133 分钟。
